title: Vice Pulled a Documentary Critical of Saudi Arabia. But Here It Is.
description:
Vice’s hard-nosed coverage on Saudi Arabia changed after investment deals with the repressive kingdom. A deleted documentary is not completely gone, however.

The post Vice Pulled a Documentary Critical of Saudi Arabia. But Here It Is. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Inside the Lefty Congressional Delegation to Latin America
description:
Rep. Greg Casar gives a rundown of a recent trip he, AOC, and a handful of other Democratic lawmakers took to leftist-run Latin American nations.

The post Inside the Lefty Congressional Delegation to Latin America appeared first on The Intercept.
